Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394031) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394031)
